bibl.title: The Office of a Choachyte in the Theban Area.
Hundred-Gated Thebes. Acts of a Colloquium on Thebes and the Theban Area in the Graeco-Roman Period
bibl.author: VLEEMING, S.P.

bibl.note: 1. Choachytes and Lector Priests. - 2. The Choachytes' Care for the Dead. - 3. Their Tombs: Brick Tombs. - 4. Their Tombs: Rock Tombs. - 5. The Choachytes and Taxes. - 6. The Choachytes as Priests.
VLEEMING S.P., The Office of a Choachyte in the Theban Area.
S.P. VLEEMING (Ed.), Hundred-Gated Thebes. Acts of a Colloquium on Thebes and the Theban Area in the Graeco-Roman Period = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXVII (Leiden, 1995) pp. 241-255, 1 fig.
